mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Originally named the E. T. Roux Library...between 1968 and 1969 the building was converted to administrative use, the student body having outgrown its capacity, and it was renamed the Thad Buckner Building at that time." --http://hcap.artstor.org/cgi-bin/library?a=d&d=p630 Houses the Academic Dean, Hollis Room, and Registrar's Office. --http://www.flsouthern.edu/map.aspx [work]
